question: Which state directed the city schools to install air purifiers to ensure that students don't face health hazards due to air pollution?
explanation: Delhi's Directorate of Education (DoE) has directed all schools in the city to install air purifiers to ensure that students don't face health hazards due to air pollution. It has directed them to "create social awareness on the adverse impact on public health due to indiscriminate burning of crackers for different festivities".
